content: उत्सद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To sink (<ab>fig.</ab> also), fall into ruin or decay; उत्सीदेयुरिमे लोकाः <ls>Bg. 3. 24.</ls> {@--2@} To leave off, quit. {@--3@} To rise up. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To destroy, annihilate, bring to ruin; उत्साद्यंते जातिधर्माः <ls>Bg. 1. 43</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 267.</ls> {@--2@} To overturn, upset (pots &c.). {@--3@} To rub in, anoint (as with oil, perfumes &c.); <ls>Y. 1. 277.</ls>
